dmca.title: Macworld.com complains of copied repair tips
dmca.body:
To whom it may concern: 

A user of BlogSpot has republished our copyrighted material without permission. 

1. Our original story is located at: 
http://www.macworld.com/2006/08/secrets/repairpermissions/index.php?pf=1 

2. The material that is infringing is located at: 
http://digitaltechworld.blogspot.com/2006/08/repairing-permissions-what-you-need-to.html 

3. You may contact me at [private] or  [private]@macworld.com. 

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

I hope you will remove the infringing material immediately. Thank you for your attention to this matter. 

[signed]
[private]

Vice President and Editorial Director 
Mac Publishing LLC / Macworld.com
